website_summaries.verdict: With a choice of lengths, this necklace is a good option for chunkier babies.
pros: Unlike many teething necklaces, you can choose your size
Just make sure not to get one that's so long your child can chew on it
Choice of amber colors, too, which is unusual and a pleasant surprise

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Very bad don’t buy The 1st one was broken when I got it in mail Brought it again that day and while I was putting the necklace on my son the white plastic screw broke off. Very not worth money at all Don’t buy
customer_reviews.author: Isaiah ausbon

customer_reviews.title: A MUST BUY!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My son has been screaming bloody murder for three days straight, hasn’t been sleeping like he use to and I knew it was due to teething. I decided to give this product a shot and boy am I glad I got it! Within an hour of putting it on him he finally took a nap and was himself again. No more crying cranky baby! LIFESAVER.
customer_reviews.author: J colon

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 1 month!!
customer_reviews.text: This necklace was just what I wanted. Until it broke today. It arrived July 5. Return window was August 5. 5 days too late. Super frustrated. My son has had other amber necklaces for years and this one breaks after one month!! Absolutely horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Loser

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product.
customer_reviews.text: Used for our 5 month old. We had one for our daughter who is almost 3 and still wont take it off, so we got the baby one and we love these things. Help so much with teething..
customer_reviews.author: Jbin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing from the quality to the packaging. It has help my 14 month old not to be as fussy mostly at night. I recommended it to all my friends!! Great buy for a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa

customer_reviews.title: Plastic
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this necklace did anything to help with teething.
customer_reviews.author: Talia

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: So cute , love the color and packaging is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Rusanne

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: These necklaces help my babies so much. About an hour after putting on the necklace they are less irritable and happier.
customer_reviews.author: trina

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 13 month old. She didn't like it at first but now she loves it. I have noticed she isn't as cranky anymore from teething. Thank you so much
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Landrum

customer_reviews.title: They work perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these for my son, teething as been a cake walk!
customer_reviews.author: Kate Ressler

customer_reviews.title: No quick release clasp
customer_reviews.text: The necklace is beautiful but will have to return it because it does not have a magnet clasp. That should have to be mandatory for these baby necklaces.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Matzko

customer_reviews.title: Teething win
customer_reviews.text: I have had a couple necklaces in the past for teething and these seem to work the best! Has helped a lot!
customer_reviews.author: James Lottes

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. I have used these on both my kids, and bought as gifts for several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sturgill

customer_reviews.title: Broken again!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed. This is the second necklace that I purchased (our first one broke) and now this one did the same thing tonight. Where the necklace always seems to brake where the necklace closes. I’ve been lucky to be there for each break, because the small broken pieces could be a choking hazard. Very disappointed because I am already past the return window. I will be going with a better quality brand in the future. 2 stars because it did work when it wasn’t broken.
customer_reviews.author: brittany

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Nice necklace for my grandson, but didn’t measure 14”. Too small for his comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Heartsd

customer_reviews.title: Broke apart after minimal use
customer_reviews.text: After only a month of use, the clasp cracked and broke apart.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Not for grownups
customer_reviews.text: The description did not state that this is a baby's necklace. I would like to return the necklace
customer_reviews.author: KT

product_meta.title: Amber Necklace Gift Set(Unisex)(Cognac)(14 Inches) - Handcrafted, Lab-Tested, Authentic Amber
product_meta.description: Size:14 Inch - LargeBaltic Amber is fossil of resin that is like sap which formed over 45millions years old from Baltic sea region of Europe. Although not a mineral, it is generally classified as a gemstone. A common misconception is that Amber is made of tree sap. Sap is the fluid that circulates through a plant's vascular system, while resin is the semi-solid amorphous organic substance secreted in pockets and canals through epithelial cells of the tree.
feature_bullets: VERY IMPORTANT - Measure before buying - Choose the right size for you
All packed in a beautiful gift box.
Safety Knotted (Individually Knotted) Beads and a "Twist Clasp" Closure Provide Added Safety and Prevent The Tisk of Choking.
We Promise Our Baltic Amber Necklaces Are Certified as 100% Authentic Amber. So Buy It without Hesitation!
